product.product_title: Nike Women's Court Legacy Lift Shoes
product.cushioning: Soft foam sockliner provides plush, step-in comfort for all-day wear, enhanced by the padded collar.
product.breathability: Combination of leather and synthetic materials offers limited breathability.
product.short_description: Elevate your classic style with the Nike Women's Court Legacy Lift Shoes. These sneakers take inspiration from Nike's rich tennis heritage and give it a modern, fashion-forward update with a lifted platform sole. The upper features a combination of smooth leather and durable synthetic materials, offering a premium look and a clean, versatile aesthetic that pairs easily with everything from jeans to dresses. The design is punctuated with heritage-inspired details, including stitched overlays and a retro Nike logo on the tongue. The defining feature is the substantial, yet lightweight, platform midsole. This lift adds a bold, contemporary touch while providing a stable and comfortable base for all-day wear. A padded collar and soft foam sockliner ensure plush comfort with every step. The durable rubber outsole with a classic herringbone pattern pays homage to its court-shoe roots. Step into a timeless silhouette reimagined for today with the Nike Court Legacy Lift.
product.about_this_item: Elevate your style with the Nike Court Legacy Lift. Its platform midsole delivers a bold statement... Subtly layered upper... Rubber outsole... Padded heel and plush tongue...
